name: Clear Twitter by Dzhyn
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://twitter.com") {
#page-container > div.AppContainer > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size2of3.u-lg-size3of4 > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size1of3,
#page-container > div.AppContainer > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size1of3.u-lg-size1of4 > div > div > div > div.ProfileUserList.ProfileUserList--socialProof,
#page-container > div.AppContainer > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size1of3.u-lg-size1of4 > div > div > div > div.ProfileHeaderCard > div.ProfileMessagingActions,
#page-container > div.AppContainer > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size2of3.u-lg-size3of4 > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size1of3 > div > div > div > div > div > div.module.wtf-module.js-wtf-module.roaming-module.has-content,
#page-container > div.ProfileCanopy.ProfileCanopy--withNav.ProfileCanopy--large.js-variableHeightTopBar > div > div.ProfileCanopy-navBar.u-boxShadow > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size2of3.u-lg-size3of4 > div > div > ul > li.ProfileNav-item.ProfileNav-item--userActions.u-floatRight.u-textRight.with-rightCaret > div > div > div,
#page-container > div.ProfileCanopy.ProfileCanopy--withNav.ProfileCanopy--large.js-variableHeightTopBar > div > div.ProfileCanopy-navBar.u-boxShadow > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size2of3.u-lg-size3of4 > div > div > ul > li.ProfileNav-item.ProfileNav-item--userActions.u-floatRight.u-textRight.with-rightCaret > div > div > span.user-actions-follow-button.js-follow-btn.follow-button,
#permalink-overlay-dialog > div.PermalinkOverlay-content > div > div > div.permalink-footer,
#permalink-overlay-dialog > div.PermalinkOverlay-content > div > div > div.module.Trends.trends.Trends--wide,
#permalink-overlay-dialog > div.PermalinkOverlay-content > div > div > div.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page > div.replies-to.permalink-inner.permalink-replies,
#permalink-overlay-dialog > div.PermalinkOverlay-content > div > div > div.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page > div.inline-reply-tweetbox.swift,
#permalink-overlay-dialog > div.PermalinkOverlay-content > div > div > div.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page > div.permalink-inner.permalink-tweet-container > div > div.content.clearfix > div > div.ProfileTweet-action.ProfileTweet-action--more.js-more-ProfileTweet-actions,
.inline-reply-tweetbox swift,
.replies-to  permalink-inner permalink-replies,
#page-container > div.AppContainer > div > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size2of3.u-lg-size3of4 > div > div.Grid-cell.u-size1of3 > div > div > div > div > div > div.Footer.module.roaming-module.Footer--slim.Footer--blankBackground > div > div,
#permalink-overlay-body > div > div.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page > div.inline-reply-tweetbox.swift,
#permalink-overlay-body > div > div.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page > div.replies-to.permalink-inner.permalink-replies,
div.follow-bar,
#permalink-overlay-body > div > div.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page > div.permalink-inner.permalink-tweet-container > div > div.content.clearfix > div > div.ProfileTweet-action.ProfileTweet-action--more.js-more-ProfileTweet-actions {display: none!important;}

.PermalinkOverlay-modal {top: 350px !important;}
}


@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.facebook.com") {
#rightCol,
#photos_snowlift > div._n9 > div > div.fbPhotoSnowliftContainer.snowliftPayloadRoot.uiContextualLayerParent > div.clearfix.fbPhotoSnowliftPopup > div.stageWrapper.lfloat._ohe > div._4g9v,
#fbPhotoSnowliftFeedbackInput,
#fbPhotoSnowliftDetails > div._5ciw.rhcFooter,
#u_0_9 > div > div,
#u_0_4,
#u_0_2 > div > div > div > div._2t-e > div._4kny._50tm,
#u_jsonp_5_8,
#u_jsonp_5_7 > div > div._3b-9 > div > div:nth-child(2),
#comment_js_io2 > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div.fsm.fwn.fcg.UFICommentActions > span._6a._3-me,
#comment_js_io2 > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div.fsm.fwn.fcg.UFICommentActions > a.UFIReplyLink._460i,
#comment_js_inx > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div.UFICommentContent > span:nth-child(2) > a,
#comment_js_iny > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div.UFICommentContent > span:nth-child(2) > a ,
a.UFIReplyLink,
#addComment,
#addComment_1730791733617511,
#u_0_1r,
._2t-f,
#u_0_0 > div > div > div > div._2t-e > div._4kny._50tm,
#fbTimelineHeadline > div._50zj > div,
a.UFITranslateLink,
a.UFILikeLink.UFIReactionLink,
#u_ps_jsonp_3_0_0 {display:none!important;}

#contentArea {width:960px!important;}

._14i5 {right:0px!important;}
}
